member.name: P:Microsoft.AppCenter.Analytics.Analytics.BindingType
member.summary: Internal SDK property not intended for public use.
member.value: The iOS SDK Analytics bindings type.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.Analytics.Analytics.IsEnabledAsync
member.summary: Check whether the Analytics service is enabled or not.
member.returns: A task with result being true if enabled, false if disabled.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.Analytics.Analytics.SetEnabledAsync(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enable or disable the Analytics service.
member.returns: A task to monitor the operation.
